reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Dimmer works fine once you figure out the wiring. It’s not a “just connect them like they were connected to the old switch” situation. It would also be nice if it only came with the white toggle and slide. Not a fan of paying for the almond and ivory “options” I don’t need or want, only to toss them in the trash.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2025
reviews.title: Wish The Almond & Ivory Were NOT Included

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: We have installed many of these dimmer switches - they are fabulous. Great when one of us needs to get up early and needs a light on -- they are quiet and can be dimmed down so as not to wake the other. Easy to install. Good value for the cost.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2025
reviews.title: Very Useful

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: leviton is one of those brands where you know it will work well. my main downgrade on stars is the light switch isn't immediate. when we flick it on, the light dims on in about a second. our old, prior two switches were way more immediate. otherwise, we're fine with it. it feels like quality. if leviton explained to me how i could get rid of the delay, i'd happy adjust it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2025
reviews.title: this switch delays the light turning on by a second...

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Never would have bought this if I had realized how ridiculously small the dimming lever is. Can't figure out what the rationale for that is. It dims LEDs, but that's not exactly new technology. And the lowest dim setting is not very low.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2025
reviews.title: There's much better out there.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Before I started looking for a dimmer switch, I did not know that LED bulbs require a dimmer switch rated for LED bulbs. I read reviews of cheaper dimmer switches that still caused the LED bulbs to flicker. This switch works great, with no flickering, from dim to bright. And, yes, you have to have LED bulbs that are dimmable; not all of them can be used with a dimmer switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2025
reviews.title: Works great with LED bulbs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Easy to install, really like the look of this particular switch over the others. Lowe’s only covers certain type and those have a “clicking” noise when you are turning off and on. This one glides from my perspective. It comes with 3 different colors I have the white color. The face cover I have on the wall did not come with it (that is purchased separate). Overall I prefer this switch over the others.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2025
reviews.title: Light switch

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: The dimmer did not work so well for my situation. That is, four, 60W light bulbs on a one-way configuration. Although easy to install, the issue is twofold. First, the ramp-up time (time it takes for the bulbs to come on) is about a second. It is not instantaneous. I tried various bulbs off their approved bulb list. I tried all combinations of the A/B switch and adjusting max/min endpoints. Also, triple-checked the wiring. The delay remained. The second issue is that there is a buzz, and the lights lightly flicker, when the dimmer is in the mid-range. Again, different bulbs and the buzz remains. I will not be purchasing this brand again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2025
reviews.title: Ramp-up time is too slow

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Works as advertised. The programming was easy to set the minimum dimming point. Would buy again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2025
reviews.title: Good switch for retrofitting standard light switch

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: This is not a good dimmer - I really like the style and the look, however, from there it is all downhill. I was replacing a perfectly functional lutron dimmer because we re-painted the room and the colors no longer matched. Chose this dimmer due to the style. The LEDs I have worked beautifully using the skylark dimmer, however, with this dimmer they flickered when going on, flickered when going off, and occasionally turned on and off at full brightness for no apparent reason as if my home's electric was possessed. I hate to shame whatever engineers designed this dimmer but they should find a new line of work and Leviton should discontinue it so as not to drag the entire brand down with it. If you are thinking maybe I got a lemon think again - I tried 3 of these on the same circuit changed the settings on the unit via "programming" and the A/B switch. Nothing worked.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2025
reviews.title: Look elsewhere.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Does not work well with the LED surface lights I have. Light takes a few seconds to come on and then goes from dim to full light when dimmer is set at highest level. Called and was notified I should have bought the $92 dimmer.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
reviews.title: Not compatible with all Lights, designed for lamps

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: This switch works as advertised. It actually dims LED lights. See video for proof. It came with a white switch cover attached and included an almond and off white switch cover that I did not use. It was foolproof to install. All of the connections are clearly labeled and the screws color coded for connecting wires. Installs in just a few minutes with screwdrivers. Looks match switches in the same bank. It is the middle switch in the picture. But the big news is that it actually dims LED lights. Worked immediately. No fiddling or adjusting required.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
reviews.title: Dims LED lights

reviews.text: Easy to install. Loved the functionality and look. It worked great while it did. Thankfully I work from home, went into the room it was installed during my break and noticed a smoke smell. The little dimming toggle had become loose somehow and wasn’t functioning properly and the plastic surrounding it had started to burn. A breaker didn’t pop which is scary. We removed and went back to a regular switch.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I blew out my dimmer switch when I was doing some DIY electrical work in my office. You'd think that might turn me off to DIY electrical work, but no. I decided the only way out was through, and if DIY got me into this mess it would get me back out. I bought this replacement for my dimmer switch, and it was simple enough for me, someone with more bravery than knowledge when it comes to electrical current, to install successfully. Now my lights can once again be dimmed, unlike the fire of my confidence. DIY forever.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2024
reviews.title: Totally works! My lights dim now.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: My previous dimmer would cause the LED bulbs in my 3 island lights to flicker. Standard dimmers all seem to be support for only 150 watts. This dimmer switch handles up to 300 watts and now my island lights never flicker when at the highest setting. The switch also comes with both white and almond color replaceable buttons so you can buy one dimmer to suite different color switches & plates in your home.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to Install & Supports Many Bulbs - Leviton Slide Dimmer for LED, Halogen & Incandescent Bulbs

reviews.text: I tried to use this product to change from the other Dimmer Switches which were two different brands, I kind of liked Leviton as I am a retired electrical contractor and used thousands of them over the years. With the new Dimmers I purchased the lights took 1 or 2 seconds to come on. One my lights flashed on and off. I called tech support and I was told that I had to use a lamp from one of the ones on a list. They also felt flimsy and rattled when you moved them, just poor quality in my opinion.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.title: I was told that if you use this switch it will only work with certain lamps.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I had a couple of cheap, no-name Chinese dimmers that were failing mechanically - electricaly they were fine. I installed these DSL06-1LZ units and immediately my wife complained of noise coming from the LED lights. I swapped out the Leviton DSL06-1LZ's for a couple of LeGrand dimmers and the noise went away. In another room, I've had a DSL06-1LZ and have just put with the noise, blaming it on cheap LED's. I took the old no-name Chinese dimmer and installed it in place of the Leviton and my loud, irritating noise was gone to my great relief. Unless you enjoy a ringing noise in the 2kHz range, avoid these dimmers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2024
reviews.title: Garbage

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: For the cost of these things, you'd think they'd make the flipping of the switch tactile feel high quality. Instead, you flip the switch and you feel a bunch of creaky/clunky play before the action completes. This gives me the impression that this switch won't last. And the fact is, these decora-style switches that feel like this... I've installed many, and they seem to fail if used often after just a year or so. Over and over. The decora-style switch is supposed to feel high end and actually be higher end than a regular flip switch. When I operate this switch, it should have a solid, smooth tactile feel. I shouldn't feel and hear the - I'm assuming - plastic rubbing on plastic on a hinge. This feels like the dashboard of an old cheap car. Very disappointing.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2024
reviews.title: Creaky, Clunk Feeling Operation

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Easy to install and good enough

reviews.title: Good dimmer

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I didn’t. Now I have LED lights that flicker off and on at full brightness setting but it’s long enough out of the return window and I threw away the packaging anyways, so I’m stuck with it. Also, if you need to adjust the range of dimming, I didn’t bother because the instructions were so confusing. They could have used an adjustment potentiometer… and instead it’s some complicated dance you have to do with the switch faceplate off. It sucks.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024
reviews.title: Trust the other one star reviewers

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: This was the 4th dimmer switch I tried in a room with 15 Halo HCL6 fixtures (approx. 14 w each) that works pretty well. All the others had some issue: flickering, wouldn't exit dimmer range setup, or didn't dim very well. This switch dims pretty well, and there isn't any flickering. I'd prefer it dim a little more, but it's pretty good as is at the factory preset. I did not see the dimmer switch to adjust the dimmer range on the back of the switch as shown in the instructions for the DSL06 model. It works pretty well as is, so I didn't investigate further if it should be there or not. The house wires connect directly to screws on the switch and makes for easy installation. No wiring nuts needed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2024
reviews.title: Finally, a 3-way dimmer switch that works as it should.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: disappointed
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2024
reviews.title: When I received the box already damaged

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DSL06-1LZ, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I installed these Leviton slide LED dimmers on several wall switches, and they work great in turning down the brightens (such as in the bathroom early in the morning in the winter) and in other rooms. They work smoothly and the slide dimmer allows setting a certain level and just tapping the large switch to turn on the lights. When turned off the switch has a small green LED on the bottom edge that stays on and acts as a sort of "finder" for the wall switch if it is totally dark. This is a well-made, quality product.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2024
reviews.title: These work great and save $$
